task6.ingredient

Class A_Ingredient

  • java.lang.Object
    • task6.ingredient.A_Ingredient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    A_IngredientBase, A_IngredientExtra

    public abstract class A_Ingredient
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the shared elements of an ingredient in the form of a decorator that may wrap another ingredient recursively.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      A_Ingredient(Money cost, java.lang.String description)
      Creates an ingredient that does not wrap another ingredient.
      A_Ingredient(Money cost, java.lang.String description, A_Ingredient ingredientWrapped)
      Creates an ingredient that wraps another ingredient.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Money getCost()
      Gets the cost of this ingredient only.
      Money getCostTotal()
      Gets the total cost of this ingredient and recursively of the ingredients it wraps.
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Gets the simple description of this ingredient only; e.g., "sugar".
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDescriptionTotal()
      Gets the description of this ingredient and recursively of the ingredients it wraps.
      java.util.List<A_Ingredient> getIngredients()
      Returns a recursive list of all ingredients directly and indirectly wrapped by this ingredient.
      A_Ingredient getIngredientWrapped()
      Gets the ingredient this ingredient wraps, if there is one.
      boolean hasIngredientWrapped()
      Returns whether this ingredient wraps another ingredient.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the string representation of this object in the form: getClass().getSimpleName(){cost=cost description=[description]}

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
